q14.question: What do the do to the gasoline?
q14.answer: ['The Pour a Trail from the Jeep to the Woods']
q14.recall: They set the gasoline on fire.
q14.vectordb: They pour gasoline on the ground to create a trail from the Jeep to the woods and then set the gasoline on fire to lure the bear. However, the bear is unharmed by the fire. They decide to try another plan and split up. Wes climbs a tree and leaves his blood-covered clothes on the ground to fool the bear. While the bear is sniffing at the clothes, Wes accidentally drops a tire iron, calling the bear's attention up. The bear shakes him out of the tree but he escapes and goes to the shack where Lauren has built a trap. They lure the bear into the shack and use a trigger to close the front door behind it, locking it in. They celebrate and start to leave, but the bear breaks out of the shack and they both try to escape. Wes is mauled and killed by the bear, while Lauren is also killed by the bear shortly after.
q14.hybrid: They pour gasoline on the ground to create a trail from the Jeep to the woods and then set the gasoline on fire to lure the bear. However, the bear is unharmed by the fire. They decide to try another plan and split up. Wes climbs a tree and leaves his blood-covered clothes on the ground to fool the bear. The bear shakes him out of the tree but he escapes and goes to the shack where Lauren has built a trap. They lure the bear into the shack and use a trigger to close the front door behind it, locking it in. They celebrate and start to leave, but the bear breaks out of the shack and they both try to escape. Wes is mauled and killed by the bear, while Lauren is also killed by the bear shortly after.
